meanings.definition: A device or tool used to rearrange letters or words into a different order.
meanings.sent1: The unscrambler helped me solve the word puzzle by rearranging the letters.
meanings.sent2: I used the unscrambler to unscramble the mixed-up words in the game.
meanings.sent3: The unscrambler was like a magic wand, turning jumbled letters into clear words.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like an unscrambler, quickly rearranging thoughts into logical order.
meanings.sent5: The unscrambler was my secret weapon in unjumbling the confusing message.

meanings.definition: A person who unscrambles letters or words.
meanings.sent1: The unscrambler at the game show helped the contestants with the word challenges.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a skilled unscrambler and always wins word games.
meanings.sent3: The unscrambler joked that unjumbling words was their superpower.
meanings.sent4: She was like a human unscrambler, effortlessly deciphering the coded message.
meanings.sent5: The unscrambler's expertise in word puzzles was unmatched.

meanings.definition: A software program that rearranges jumbled letters or words.
meanings.sent1: I used the unscrambler on my phone to help me unjumble the words.
meanings.sent2: The unscrambler software quickly unjumbled the mixed-up letters on the screen.
meanings.sent3: The unscrambler program made unjumbling words feel like a game.
meanings.sent4: The unscrambler app was a lifesaver when it came to solving word puzzles.
meanings.sent5: With the unscrambler software, unjumbling words became a breeze.
